title: You can now register for TypeCon!
content:
You can now register for TypeCon! Yay!!!

Now to decide on classes...

Who did that guy with the mustache & monocle in the logo? Does he have a name like the “the thing” in Seattle did?

Who is going?

 [‹ Feliz Feliz! Ale Ale!](http://web.archive.org/web/20080605060544/http:/typophile.com/node/45887 "Go to previous forum topic") [Help! Question about typeface usage on Mac ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080605060544/http:/typophile.com/node/45930 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Eben Sorkin

comments.content: And here’s an easter egg for you — you can move the guy’s parts around and rearrange him: just click and drag. Cool, eh?

David Moore, a local Buffalo designer and rock star, did that [guy with the mustache & monocle](http://web.archive.org/web/20080605060544/http:/www.typecon.com/). There are 6 other different character lock-ups as well, look for for them all on other media. I don’t think we have named them yet... how about “punkts”?
And there may some more “punkts” popping up on the new site at any time as well. Keep any eye out, you never know when they will pop up.
Really, new Punkts on the web site? I am hitting refresh as fast as I can.

Alpha Crazy???  
Saw Dj Dr. Wisz + Scotty tracklist. Pretty cool stuff they spin...  
Classy.  
Party on!

Yes, indeed, very cool DJs again this year. We are lucky to have designer friends that also can rock the house.

A note on the conference hotel - it’s filling faster than in any other year. We are just about out of double rooms, so if you want to share, you need to call the hotel directly to book and see if they have some left. If you plan to share, please hurry. We still have some kings left, and suites for you high rollers.
I’m a dj as well. It would be nice to show all typeheadz some brasilian dancefloor vibes. Maybe one day... :)

Frederico, Brazilian dancefloor vibes - I’m down with that. Let’s talk :)

In the meantime, for those looking for a little more of the tasty Punkts, refresh the homepage at [http://www.typecon.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20080605060544/http:/www.typecon.com/ "http://www.typecon.com") a few times and enjoy.
Eep, sorry Shu :) I got so excited about the little creatures, I just had to share...

Tamye, I’m very interested in this workshop:

THURSDAY, JULY 17  
9:00 am-5:30 pm: Experiments in Typography with the Dutchies

I’d like to know more about it before registering.  
Thanks

Frederico, that workshop has been changed to its real title, Thinking About Thinking. There is a full description now - it sounds really great and should be a fantastic experience.

[http://www.typecon.com/calendar.php?category=Workshops](http://web.archive.org/web/20080605060544/http:/www.typecon.com/calendar.php?category=Workshops "http://www.typecon.com/calendar.php?category=Workshops")
